saved_question.name: Has Tanium Standard Utilities API TEST
saved_question.query_text: Get Has Tanium Standard Utilities from all machines

question.query_text: Get Has Tanium Standard Utilities from all machines

sensor.name: Has Tanium Standard Utilities
sensor.description: Returns whether a machine has the Tanium Standard Utilities Example: Yes

query.script:
'======================================== ' Has Tanium Standard Utilities '========================================
' this action will look to see if the client has ' all necessary standard utilities files
Option Explicit '-------------------- ' Set These Variables Dim strDesiredVersion,strDesiredFCIVVersion,strDesiredGrepBinaryVersion Dim strDesiredGrepDepVersion,strGrepDepFileVersion,strGrepBinaryFileVersion
' a string value which is a version like ' 4.2.314.7111 ' which is used to determine whether the bundle has the correct version ' updating the content will cause the bundle number to change and all files will ' be sent to the endpoint again. This is to handle the case where ' binary files are not versioned, such as with Yara
' The top line of the version file 'Tanium File Version: <version string below> strDesiredVersion = "6.5.2.0164"
' ------------------- ' Binaries we can version strDesiredGrepBinaryVersion = "2.5.4.3331" strDesiredGrepDepVersion = "1.12.2872.39125"
Dim objFSO Dim strDirToCheck,objTextFile Dim bHasAllLatestFiles,arrTextFilesToCheck,strFile,strVersionLine,strFileVersion Dim strFCIVFile,strFCIVFileVersion,strGrepBinary,strGrepDep,strHandleTool,strListDLLs2 Dim strListDLLs,strStreamsTool,strAutorunsTool Dim strYara,strYarac
Set objFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
strDirToCheck = GetTaniumDir("Tools\StdUtils")
arrTextFilesToCheck = Array("copy-to-tanium-dir-predist.vbs","runas-allusers-wrapper.vbs","ver\bundle.cfg")
' Grep is required strGrepBinary=strDirToCheck&"grep\bin\grep.exe" strGrepDep=strDirToCheck&"grep\bin\libiconv2.dll"
'Yara binaries are required strYara=strDirToCheck&"yara\yara"&GetBitness&".exe" strYarac=strDirToCheck&"yara\yarac"&GetBitness&".exe"
bHasAllLatestFiles = True For Each strFile In arrTextFilesToCheck If Not objFSO.FileExists(strDirToCheck&strFile) Then WScript.Echo "Missing " & strFile bHasAllLatestFiles = False End If If objFSO.FileExists(strDirToCheck&strFile) Then Set objTextFile = objFSO.OpenTextFile(strDirToCheck&strFile) strVersionLine = LCase(objTextFile.ReadLine()) ' version is at top of line If Not InStr(strVersionLine,"tanium file version:") > 0 Then ' must have a version number in top line WScript.Echo strFile&" is not versioned on line 1" bHasAllLatestFiles = False Else ' we have a version number, not split to check strFileVersion = Split(strVersionLine,"tanium file version:")(1) If Trim(strFileVersion) <> Trim(strDesiredVersion) Then WScript.Echo strFile&" version: "&strFileVersion&", needs: "&strDesiredVersion bHasAllLatestFiles = False End If End If objTextFile.Close End If Next
' check a Grep dependency If Not objFSO.FileExists(strGrepDep) Then WScript.Echo "Missing " & strGrepDep bHasAllLatestFiles = False End If If objFSO.FileExists(strGrepDep) Then
strGrepDepFileVersion = objFSO.GetFileVersion(strGrepDep) If Not strGrepDepFileVersion = strDesiredGrepDepVersion Then bHasAllLatestFiles = False WScript.Echo strGrepDep &" version: "&strGrepDepFileVersion&", needs: "&strDesiredGrepDepVersion End If End If
' check Grep binary If Not objFSO.FileExists(strGrepBinary) Then WScript.Echo "Missing " & strGrepBinary bHasAllLatestFiles = False End If If objFSO.FileExists(strGrepBinary) Then strGrepBinaryFileVersion = GetFileVersion(strGrepBinary) If Not strGrepBinaryFileVersion = strDesiredGrepBinaryVersion Then bHasAllLatestFiles = False WScript.Echo strGrepBinary &" version: "&strGrepBinaryFileVersion&", needs: "&strDesiredGrepBinaryVersion End If End If
If Not objFSO.FileExists(strYara) Then bHasAllLatestFiles = False WScript.Echo "Missing " & strYara End If
If Not objFSO.FileExists(strYarac) Then bHasAllLatestFiles = False WScript.Echo "Missing " & strYarac End If
If bHasAllLatestFiles Then WScript.Echo "Yes" Else WScript.Echo "No" End If
Function GetFileVersion(strPath) Dim objFSO Set objFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") If objFSO.FileExists(strPath) Then GetFileVersion = objFSO.GetFileVersion(strPath) Else GetFileVersion = -1 End If End Function 'GetFileVersion
Function GetTaniumDir(strSubDir) Dim strComputer, key32path, key64path, keyPath, reg Dim strPath strComputer = "." Const HKLM = &h80000002
key32Path = "Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" key64Path = "Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client"
Set reg=GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" & strComputer & "\root\default:StdRegProv")
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, key64Path) Then keyPath = key64Path ElseIf RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, key32Path) Then keyPath = key32Path End If
reg.GetStringValue HKLM,keyPath,"Path", strPath
If strSubDir <> "" Then strSubDir = "\" & strSubDir End If
Dim fso Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") If fso.FolderExists(strPath) Then If Not fso.FolderExists(strPath & strSubDir) Then fso.CreateFolder(strPath & strSubDir) End If GetTaniumDir = strPath & strSubDir & "\" End If End Function
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function GetBitness If Not Is64 Then GetBitness = "32" Else GetBitness = "64" End If End Function 'GetBitness
Function Is64 Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then Is64 = True Else Is64 = False End If Next End Function ' Is64
